Description:
URGENT SALE
MUST BE SOLD within the month. This 3 bedroom home is a very URGENT SALE. We are open to fair and reasonable offers. The asking price is above $450,000. Phone now to arrange an inspection and make an offer. Picturesque in splendid autumnal gardens, pleasantly opposite a pretty park, convenient to schools and charming in its impeccable presentation is this classic Croydon Hills home. With double garage and brick paved drive, a light and spacious living and dining room of soft quality fittings, charming laminate hostess kitchen with adjoining meals and separate sitting/family area plus the clever generosity of well robed bedrooms and a large classy ensuite to master, this home is pure comfort. Enjoy the rear patio and back garden, ducted warmth and an air conditioner and know you've found your home ground.

Description:
Ready to move into with no more to spend
Rare opportunity to secure a quality well appointed family home located in the popular "Croydon Hills" area.
This three bedroom plus study home boasts a large lock up garage with trailer storage or workshop.
Located in a child friendly court, with end of court access to park and playgrounds.
Recently refurbished with quality fittings, curtains granite kitchen and ensuite benchtops, federation style bathroom featuring clawfoot bath, gold plated fittings and marble benchtop.
With a short walk to Croydon Hills Primary, Good Shepherd and Luther College, this is a home for the discerning buyer.
Features:
- Double lock up garage with workshop
- Seperate dogs yard/childrens play area
- Ducted heating
- Airconditioner
- Clawfoot bath
- Granite/marble benchtops
- Main bedroom with walk in robe, other bedrooms with built in robes

Description:
Where The Heart Is
The epitome of the family home, this welcoming abode is extremely accommodating. Set on almost a third of an acre (approx. 1273SQM), the property presents a rare chance for those looking to enter the Croydon Hills market. A charming front porch ushers guests into the warm interior where they are greeted by a formal lounge and dining complemented by an open fireplace. Clearly an enchanting entertainer, the home also possesses a layout conducive to family life. The well appointed kitchen overlooks an open meals and living area. French doors reveal a shaded deck ideal for alfresco dining. Picturesque, easy-to-maintain lawns are made private by established plantation. Family zoning places a guest suite (complete with ensuite and walk-in robe) at the front of the home, while the remaining bedrooms (with built-in robes) are privately positioned towards the rear, alongside a study. Enjoying access to a private courtyard, the master bedroom is also equipped with copious walk-through mirrored robes and a luxuriant, full-sized ensuite with spa. This alluring abode is within easy reach of quality schools (such as Yarra Valley Grammar), bus stops and other amenities.
Presented by PhilipWebb Real Estate.

Description:
A SUAVE STATEMENT IN CLASS & STYLE...AUCTION THIS SATURDAY!
Capturing a discerning style through generous cleverly zoned open spaces and eye-catching finishes, the home has been creatively transformed to stand out from the crowd and deliver an exceptional ambience for family living and entertaining. Upon entering you will discover the refined formal lounge, flowing through to massive family/dining area, with wet bar, Coonara and gourmet Smeg kitchen, which seamlessly adjoins a sensational outdoor room, complete with party-size spa, yearning to entertain all year round. Upstairs the kids have their own retreat, plus 3 bedrooms, 5th bedroom/study & bathroom, away from the master bedroom with WIR & ensuite & 2nd bathroom. An array of highlights include a private rear garden with cubby & shed, remote control double garage and a great court location close to Candlebark Walk, shops, Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College and Eastlink.
* Photo ID required for all Open Home Inspections

Address: 122 Croydon Hills Drive Croydon Hills VIC 3136
Description:
Inspect The Best
A unique sanctuary set amidst tranquil leafy surrounds, this beautiful family home is an entertainer’s delight. A fresh colour palette harmonises with newly laid carpet and terracotta-hued tiling. Natural light filters through an abundance of windows which combine with tall ceilings to create atmospheric openness.
Catering for formal and informal requirements, the comprehensive layout consists of multiple open plan living and dining spaces which seamlessly flow to an alfresco area ideal for year-round entertaining. A rumpus room, warmed by a wood-fire heater, adds to the living options. At the heart of the home, a beautiful kitchen boasts quality stainless-steel appliances and coffee-toned benches.
The sumptuous master bedroom enjoys walk-through robes which lead to a striking ensuite complete with spa bath. Located at the opposite end of the home, the remaining bedrooms boast built-in robes and are serviced by an immaculate family bathroom. Exuding elegance without compromising on practicality, this outstanding home combines a unique and spacious layout with many modern inclusions, such as: gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, new carpet, renovated kitchen, R/C DLUG.
Located in easy reach of schools – Croydon Hills & Yarra Road Primary Schools, Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar & Maroondah Secondary College – as well as McAdams Square shops and public transport.
Presented by PhilipWebb Real Estate.

Description:
Picture Of Perfection
Not too big, not too small, but just right for a quality lifestyle, this stunning home has been stylishly updated to a high level of contemporary sophistication. Recently painted and re-carpeted, fresh tones merge with abundant natural light to create atmospheric openness. Immaculately presented, the well-configured layout showcases an intuitive use of space. A large L-shaped lounge and dining room progresses to a striking kitchen boasting stainless-steel appliances and Caesar-stone benches. The meal preparation area oversees a meals space and study nook. Sliding doors reveal the alfresco entertaining quadrant which consists of a covered patio bordered by vibrant, low-maintenance gardens. Privately zoned, the bedrooms are equipped with built-in robes and serviced by a remarkably modern bathroom. A sumptuous space, the master bedroom enjoys a large walk-in robe and an ensuite. Adding to the appeal of the prestigious locale, the home is within walking distance of bus stops, McAdams Square shops and renowned schools. Features include: split-system air-conditioning, gas ducted heating, remote-controlled lock-up garage with a wood/storage shed and enough room for 2 small cars.
Presented by PhilipWebb Real Estate.

Description:
Relaxed Lakeside Living... Under Offer
An idyllic spot to just put your feet up and relax, this exceptional lakeside home delivers all the space you'll need to nurture your family in comfort, as it grows and evolves. Positioned within an easy walk to Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College, lovely parks and wetlands.... its flowing layout boasts formal lounge and dining room, featuring north-facing bay windows, extending to a vast family room illuminated by a skylight and with access to the low-maintenance backyard with space for boat or caravan. A sparkling well-appointed kitchen includes a gas cook top, wall oven and dishwasher, overlooking the meals area also with outdoor access.... Loved by children and adults alike, the private rear yard includes a separate outdoor entertaining area and a solar-heated pool surrounded by decking. A private study at the front of the home is an ideal homework space for school-aged children, with three robed bedrooms serviced by two bathrooms, the main bathroom with a separate shower and bath. At the rear of the house, the large master bedroom boasts a fitted walk-in wardrobe and ensuite, with sliding door access to an intimate deck. Further appointments: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double remote garage, external awnings, new carpets, skylights, storage and solar heating for the pool.

Description:
A Great Family Buy
On a large corner allotment in the popular Croydon Hills estate is this solid brick veneer home that has something for everyone as a 1st home buyer, young family buyer or as a great investment.
The home comes complete with 4 good sized robed bedrooms, the main has a full ensuite, there are 2 living areas consisting of lounge dining and family meals.
The kitchen is centrally located with plenty of bench space for the chef of the family to prepare all meals very comfortably. Before stepping outside other internal features include main bathroom with separate toilet, split system air conditioning, gas ducted heating, 2 draw dishwasher, security shutters, colonial windows, light filled interiors with soft subtle tones.
Outside you have a view from the kitchen and family room of the large undercover entertaining area and beyond to the flat spacious backyard that is ideal for children and pets to play safely.
The over sized garage has plenty of room for 2 large cars and still room for workshop area, the dual driveways gives you side access to the backyard for caravan, boats or trailers storage or maybe even room for a large shed.
All this is within strolling distance to respected schools, shops and transport.
With something for everyone this home is an absolute gem, so book your viewing today.

Description:
An Elite Location To Raise Your Family
Superbly sited within a desirable court location walking distance to Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College, transport, McAdam Square shopping facilities and lakeside walking tracks, this quality family home is sure to appeal. Promising a balanced lifestyle of comfort, convenience and relaxation, the home comprises 3 bedrooms plus a study and includes a spotless ensuite and walk-in-robe to the main. Enjoying a well executed floorplan perfect for family harmony, the home is complemented by a graciously appointed formal lounge and dining room that is warmed by the softly simmering embers from the open fireplace. Leading through to a spacious timber kitchen with dishwasher, the home opens into a light-filled casual meals area and combined family room perfect for relaxed casual encounters. Appointed with gas ducted heating, ducted vacuum and a paved entertaining zone, the home delivers endless hours of enjoyment for all the family with an in ground, solar heated pool. Providing a child friendly backyard, a garden shed, a double garage and established gardens that deliver absolute privacy, this warm and inviting residence is a must to see!
Carl Payne : 0413 589 800

Description:
Great Home, Great Location, Great Value
You couldn't you get a better location. Croydon Hills prides itself on being a family friendly location, having plenty of quality schools nearby (including Luther College, The Good Shepherd and Yarra Valley Grammar) and many shopping options within walking distance or a short drive away. Surrounded by a selection of parks and reserves, it shouldn't be forgotten that access to the vineyard play ground is only within 20 minutes from here!. Have you been convinced yet? Perhaps the beautifully presented 3 bedroom, plus study home will do the trick? Throughout the journey in this home you can tell it is warm, inviting and will definitely offer a real place to call home for your family. The 2 bathrooms and kitchen are still like new, while the lounge/dining and family room offer plenty of space to entertain or lounge around with the kids. Outside has a few hidden treasures of its own. There's a few peaceful sitting spots and a entertaining pergola which overlooks the secured swimming pool. New fencing on most sides of the property is a bonus, so too is the inclusion of a dishwasher, ducted heating and a double garage.
Expected rental in the vicinity of $410-$430 per week
Photo ID required for all Open Home Inspections

Description:
Fit For A Family
Stylishly updated, this striking home - in the bowl of a quiet court, opposite parkland - presents numerous living and entertaining options. Infused with an abundance of natural light, the interior is further offset by refreshing neutral tones, bamboo floorboards and slate tiles. A sunken formal lounge (complemented by a gas fireplace) lies adjacent a formal dining room easily accessed by a well-equipped timber kitchen with clear views of the casual meals area. French doors open into a large rumpus room, perfectly proportioned for billiards and other recreational activities. Privately zoned and serviced by a bright bathroom, the bedrooms are equipped with built-in robes - the master also boasting an ensuite. A large study may be transformed into an additional bedroom to cater for an expanding brood.
Ideal for summer soirees, the outside entertaining domain includes a built-in mains gas barbeque and a TV. A grassy play zone provides ample room for children and pets. This family-friendly home is in easy reach of quality schools, shops and transport.
Features:
* Evaporative cooling
* Gas ducted heating
* Alarm system
* Loft with storage
Presented by PhilipWebb Real Estate.

Description:
Stylish Family Home
Just moments away from quality local schools, including Luther College, The Good Shepherd Primary and Yarra Valley Grammar, you'll discover this beautifully renovated family home. Inside there's loads of attractive highlights including, 3 sizable bedrooms, a stylish family bathroom updated to appeal to most tastes, utilising a crisp color palette and seamless fittings and fixtures. The kitchen has also been on the receiving end of a spectacular improvement, now acting as a easy workable space with glistening Bosch stainless appliances, including a dishwasher and glass splashbacks, resulting in an ultra smart appeal. The lounge is an inviting space in the home and includes a reverse cycle air conditioner, gas wall heater. There is a second reverse cycle cooling unit in the main bedroom along with an electric wall heater.
Stepping out into the back yard you'll find a beautifully landscaped garden with a sensational Elm tree as a highlighted feature, and the pergola would definitely be a sensational space in the warmer months to enjoy with family or friends. There's plenty of off street parking available out the front which is designed with carefree, water tolerable plants.
There are many more highlights including timber floating floors, external window blinds, single carport and a quiet court location.

Description:
UNDER OFFER/CONTRACT
Entertaining will be a breeze in this stunning family home, tucked away in a quiet backstreet in superb Croydon Hills. If it's a larger family you're trying to accommodate with the need to be close to quality schools, shops and transport, it would seem your search may be over. Beyond its single level brick facade is a world of delightful living spaces, including a formal lounge, split level dining room and an impressive open plan kitchen and spacious family room. Vinyl wrap cabinetry, stylish stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher complete the picture for the heart of the home, while both bathrooms are presented beautifully with a modern edge. The 4 bedrooms are roomy and include built in robes with a spectacular walk in robe for the master suite; ladies, this may just win you over! Gleaming timber flooring eventually glides your attention out the back, where you'll be pleasantly surprised with the enormous pergola and gazebo with an outdoor spa; you couldn't ask for more of an ideal entertaining space. Other highlights include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, single garage with work shed plus plenty of off street parking and another garden shed neatly tucked away behind feature fencing. A sensational opportunity which shouldn't be missed.

Description:
Under Offer/Under Contract
On the high side of the street in a quiet sought-after location, this three bedroom home presents fabulous opportunities for astute investors and first home buyers. Securely tenanted until May 2011, it gives you ample time to explore your options whilst generating an income. Three robed bedrooms are serviced by a spacious family bathroom, the master bedroom offering a discreet ensuite-effect. This well-serviced position is within walking distance of Candlebark Walk, Yarra Rd Primary School, a kindergarten, reserves with playgrounds and nearby buses.

Description:
Quality Family Living
This distinguished family home is set on a large allotment affording spacious front and rear gardens. Immaculately presented, the interior spans two levels – the bottom dedicated to informal and formal living and the top allocated to the sleeping quarters. The study may double as an additional bedroom. Slate tiles adorn the entry which leads onto the sumptuous lounge and dining rooms. From here, the light-filled kitchen (boasting electric oven, gas hot plates & an ASKO dishwasher) oversees a casual meals area adjacent a large family room. The private backyard, bordered by established plantation, is overseen by an alfresco dining and barbeque area – an ideal place for summer soirees. Immersed in natural light, the sizeable bedrooms are privy to verdant, tree-top vistas; the master benefits from an ensuite and walk-in robe. Superbly situated, the home is in walking distance of Yarra Valley Grammar and close to shops, parks and other quality schools. Features: ducted heating; evaporative cooling, abundant storage space; powder room; double garage.
Presented by PhilipWebb Real Estate.

Description:
Raise Your Family Here!
Boasting a supreme court location and walking distance to Luther College, Croydon Hills Primary, Yarrunga Reserve, buses and lakeside walking tracks, this premium, double storey residence is the perfect place to raise your family. Welcoming you inside to a pristine interior, this inviting home showcases a charming formal lounge and dining room and extends into a beautifully remodeled Blackwood timber kitchen complemented by newly installed stainless steel appliances. Enjoying a family-sized meals area as warm as the morning sunshine, the home leads through to a tiled family room perfect for casual conversations. Leading upstairs to 4 bedrooms (including a KING-sized parents retreat with ensuite and walk-in-robe), the home caters for the growing family with large bedroom accommodation and BIG central bathroom facilities. Offering a most impressive interior rich in family living, the home features a superb outdoor covered entertainment area that leads directly to an upper level entertaining deck and fully fenced in-ground spa perfect for premium outdoor enjoyment. Surrounded by established manicured gardens and shaded by mature trees, the home has been freshly painted throughout and enjoys the creature comforts of gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, security alarm, ducted vacuum, powder room, 2 water tanks, side gate access for boat/trailer and a remote double lock-up garage with internal access. With no expense spared, this elite, first class residence is highlighted by a shaded front porch and delivers a superior facade. Perfect for the astute family seeking the ultimate lifestyle, call now!
James Brougham : 0412 620 498

Description:
Comfort for ALL the FAMILY
Set in a premium location within walking distance to Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College, McAdam Square Shopping centre, lakeside walking tracks and transport services, this immaculate family home offers a discreet street presence and provides quality living accommodation for all to enjoy. Greeted by a slate entry, the home is complemented by a spaciously appointed lounge room filled with natural light and leads into a spic and span kitchen with double oven and dishwasher well equipped for entertaining and meal time preparations. Featuring a sizeable meals area ideal for relaxed dining experiences, the home enjoys 3 bedrooms and caters for Mum and Dad with a newly updated ensuite and walk in robe facilities. Warmed by gas ducted heating and the natural light that filters throughout, the home is perfect for those with a focus on family and features an expansive covered entertaining deck that overlooks an extra large backyard with garden shed. Including a double carport with access to the rear, this complete package is ready for your detailed inspection.
Paul Bennetts : 0419 324 463

Description:
See, Stay, Love!
Upon first viewing this 3 bedroom plus study family home, you’ll want to stay; the longer you stay, the more you will love it! Set over a single level, the layout flows cohesively from one living space to another. The formal lounge/dining is the entertaining hub and is complemented by an open fireplace – an inviting place to curl up during the winter months. The study may be utilised as a home office due to its own side entrance. Overseen by a well-equipped kitchen, the casual meals and family room lead onto a long decking ideal for summer soirees. Back inside, polished boards and a soft colour palette accentuate the layout, allowing focus to turn to the majestic scenery - the kitchen, deck and family room are privy to views over the Dandenong Ranges. Gently sloping landscaped gardens mimic the surrounding undulating vistas; the tranquil river inspired theme is a textural delight that must be experienced in person to fully appreciate. Close to local shops, transport and quality schools such as Yarra Valley Grammar and Rudolf Steiner, this home is intrinsically family compatible.
• Master bedroom with modern ensuite & large walk-in robe
• Open fireplace
• Evaporative cooling
• Gas ducted heating
• Landscaped, themed gardens
• 3000L water tank
• Double remote-controlled garage with mezzanine storage
Presented by PhilipWebb Real Estate.

Description:
Phenomenal, Family, Fun
Looking for room to grow, run, play and stretch out? Or maybe you crave a home with incredible entertaining opportunities? Would a fantastic and rare family location 100m from a prestigious school answer all your wishes? What about all these things and more?
Situated in a quiet, tree-lined, cul-de-sac this remarkable 4 bedroom and large study, 3 bathroom (all with showers), family home features spacious living areas offering a broad selection of spaces to entertain guests, enjoy family time or relax. The L-shaped formal lounge and dining, open-plan kitchen and meals, large rumpus and family rooms, are bathed in natural light. With an exceptional fusion of indoor and outdoor living, the abode offers extraordinary undercover and alfresco decked entertaining areas, spilling over onto private, rear landscaped gardens.
Superbly located around the corner from Yarra Valley Grammar, Narr-Mean Reserve, buses and local shops, this phenomenal home is also within walking distance of Luther College, Good Sheppard Primary, Kalinda Primary and Warranwood Reserve. Minutes drive to Croydon Hills Primary, Melbourne Rudolf Steiner School, Maroondah Secondary, Parkwood Secondary and Warranwood Primary, all family needs are impressively met.
Features:
• Huge 922sqm (approximately) block
• Gas ducted heating, 6-zoned evaporative cooling (split system A/C in family room)
• Ducted vacuum system
• Zoned security system and intercom throughout
• Located exclusively on the top floor are 4 bedrooms (all with BIRs), master also with ensuite
• Study (with built-in shelves)
• Timber kitchen featuring wall oven, dishwasher, cooktop and range hood
• Large, rear, 44sqm decked area, half undercover, half alfresco (with external lighting and surround sound wiring from family room)
• Outdoor, 8-seater spa
• 2 rear sheds
• Double undercover carport plus off-street parking for 4 cars
• Lots of storage throughout
Presented by PhilipWebb Real Estate.
